pages.text: You are the unique wisdom in this world, and your achievements should not be limited to just slaying dragons.

pages.title: Neutron Essence
pages.text: Try not to dwell on it too much.
The power of the cosmos lies in your hands.

The Endless Ingot can be used to craft various creative items and can be transmuted into 12 Creative Essences by the Philosopher's Stone. These surplus essences may be used to reduce the difficulty of further crafting.

pages.title: Star of Gems
pages.text: Creating 50 magic pool... or...? No, don't think like that.

pages.title: Multiversal Certificate
pages.text: Synthesized through an End Gateway Infusion Altar.

pages.title: Creative Stone
pages.text: Just one step away from awakening.

pages.title: Creative Stone
pages.text: You can obtain it infinitely after completing this.
